comment.author: Beau
comment.text: He's doing 5 rallies today. A true fighter and patriot just like us!

replies.text: Don't forget Hillary Rodham Clinton wanted Trump dead last night!

replies.text: Podesta said in 3/2015, Hillary is acting like a RETARD. She also smells like a combination of Boliled Cabbage, Urine & F@rts. He added I am guessing its related to her fall or she rarely bathes. Wikileaks.

replies.text: TRUMP HAS THE WILL , STRENGTH , AND STANIMIA TO BE A GOOD PRESIDENT ! THIS WHY GOD HAS SENT HIM TO SALVAGE WHATS LEFT OF THIS DYING COUNTRY !
